body:
I've been played avicus for since 2013 and mczone since 2012.  I have played in 4 tournaments. 2nd in 2, and I can't remember the rest.
I have played for a lot of teams, but the most memorable have been Bad Company and Apollo.

I am currently 15 years old, ask me what u want I'll try, to be honest with opinions.

replies.body: known you for quite a while, didn't really like you before. But when I joined Apollo for the first time I got to meet you better, and we became good friends. From today you're a cool guy, but I will never understand why you still spend so much time on this game.

replies.body:
1. found a good hooker site for you http://www.applefieldsschool.co.uk/

2. Ocean man, take me by the hand, lead me to the land that you understand 
Ocean man, the voyage to the corner of the globe is a real trip 
Ocean man, the crust of a tan man imbibed by the sand 
Soaking up the thirst of the land
Ocean man, can you see through the wonder of amazement at the oberman 
Ocean man, the crust is elusive when it casts forth to the childlike man 
Ocean man, the sequence of a life form braised in the sand
Soaking up the thirst of the land
Ocean man, ocean man 
Ocean man
